kitsunemod:FoxShape.NAME: Fox Shape
kitsunemod:FoxShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Fox. Exhaust.

kitsunemod:KitsuneShape.NAME: Kitsune Shape
kitsunemod:KitsuneShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Weak. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Kitsune. Exhaust.

kitsunemod:HumanShape.NAME: Human Shape
kitsunemod:HumanShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !B! Block. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Human. Exhaust.

kitsunemod:Ingenuity.NAME: Ingenuity
kitsunemod:Ingenuity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block + !M! more for each time you've kitsunemod:Shapeshifted this combat.

kitsunemod:TestTheirTactics.NAME: Test Their Tactics
kitsunemod:TestTheirTactics.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw a card.

kitsunemod:SplitSoul.NAME: Split Soul
kitsunemod:SplitSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Draw a card. kitsunemod:Elder: Draw 5 cards.

kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.NAME: Memorize Spell
kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Retain it until next turn.
kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose a card in your hand. Retain it until next turn.

kitsunemod:IgniteSilhouette.NAME: Ignite Silhouette
kitsunemod:IgniteSilhouette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain kitsunemod:Dark equal to unblocked damage.

kitsunemod:EssenceTheft.NAME: Essence Theft
kitsunemod:EssenceTheft.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! kitsunemod:Soulsteal and manually trigger it.

kitsunemod:NinetailedForm.NAME: Ninetailed Form
kitsunemod:NinetailedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You count as in all three kitsunemod:Shapes at once, Soulsteal gives you 3 Will-o-Wisps, and you gain base 2 Strength and Dexterity.

kitsunemod:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
kitsunemod:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: twice. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Gain !M! kitsunemod:Shade. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: And !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:CleansingNova.NAME: Cleansing Nova
kitsunemod:CleansingNova.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, then strip all of your Block to deal that much damage to all enemies. Exhaust.
